text: Hi, is it possible to make a user database in Genie? what is the easiest way?

elements.text: Hi, is it possible to make a user database in Genie? what is the easiest way?

text: Unsure exactly what you mean. Genie is a web framework so it would not make the database. You should use a Julia database package to write to some SQL database you set up independently. If you want user’s to create accounts and store hashed passwords etc then you could use genie for that.

elements.text: Unsure exactly what you mean. Genie is a web framework so it would not make the database. You should use a Julia database package to write to some SQL database you set up independently.
